flip_box

Source: R/flip_box.R
flip_box.Rd

AdminLTE flipBox.

flip_box(
  id,
  front_content,
  back_content,
  front_text = "More Info",
  back_text = "Back to Front"
)

Arguments

id

the flipbox id
front_content

ui for the front of the flip box
back_content

ui for the back of the flip box
front_text

text for front button
back_text

text for back button

Value

HTML tagList

Warning

this function is experimental.

References

https://rinterface.github.io/shinydashboardPlus/reference/flipBox.html

Examples

library(shiny)
library(shinydashboard)

#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘shinydashboard’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:shinydashboardPlus’:
#> 
#>     box, dashboardHeader, dashboardPage, dashboardSidebar, messageItem,
#>     notificationItem, taskItem
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:graphics’:
#> 
#>     box
library(shinydashboardPlus)
shinyApp(
  ui = dashboardPage(
    dashboardHeader(),
    dashboardSidebar(),
    dashboardBody(
      flip_box(
        id = "id",
        front_content = div(
          class = "text-center",
          img(
            src = "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/149/149076.svg",
            height = "300px",
            width = "100%"
          )
        ),
        back_content = div(
          class = "text-center",
          height = "300px",
          width = "100%",
          h1("Details...."),
          p("More information....")
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  
  server = function(input, output, session) {
  }
)

#> Error in flip_box(id = "id", front_content = div(class = "text-center",     img(src = "https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/149/149076.svg",         height = "300px", width = "100%")), back_content = div(class = "text-center",     height = "300px", width = "100%", h1("Details...."), p("More information...."))): could not find function "flip_box"
